root.Description: Morgan and her family lived in Florida. They heard a hurricane was coming. They decided to evacuate to a relative's house. They arrived and learned from the news that it was a terrible storm. They felt lucky they had evacuated when they did.

Dialogues.Utterance: "Why are we packing all our stuff?"
"Thank you so much for your help
"You're welcome. I'm glad I could help."
